attributes.action: stop facebook page '' dead baby jokes ''
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, respectfully require H.M Government to enter into discussion with Face book regarding the permanent removal of the group dead baby jokes to be removed permanently This includes: jokes, innuendo, photographs, drawings, downloads and links. Face book will be made aware of the, said, groups and individuals by their current and/or updated reporting system. the jokes they share contain sexually and physical abuse towards children.
